09:59 <Pbas> Hi everyone,  
09:59 <ujjwal> has quit  
10:00 <Pbas> It seem http://coc.myxwiki.org is down because Skol (is it a beer or a viking?) is displayed  
10:00 <Pbas> since yesterday night  
10:01 <vmassol> Pbas: we have a pb with myxwiki.org  
10:01 <vmassol> been down since yesterday night  
10:01 <Pbas> ha ok I let you working then. thxs :-)  
10:03 <vmassol> yep we're on it  
10:08 <vmassol> Pbas: should be up now  
10:18 <Pbas> indeed. Thxs :-)

14:09 <ujjwal> has joined #xwiki  
14:12 <mrvis> has joined #xwiki  
14:14 <acotiuga> has quit  
14:15 <avisser> has quit  
14:48 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
14:57 <msmeria> has quit  
15:44 <mrvis> Question on markdown: I can't seem to figure out if images are supported at all. I've tried `image:foobar.png` (comes out literal) & `[[image:foobar.png]]` (links to create a child page). I'm about to try installing the Radeox macro and going about it that way. Any advice?  
15:57 <ClemensR> is  ![altText](foobar.png)  not working? that should be the markdown way (I thought)  
15:58 <vmassol> nooooo don't use the radeox macro, that's very old and deprecated! :)  
15:58 <vmassol> yes images are supported AFAIK  
15:58 <vmassol> (in markdown syntax)  
16:00 <mrvis> no mention of images in github/pegdown or xwiki/markdown11  
16:01 <mrvis> will try ClemensR  
16:03 <mrvis> ClemensR++ - no "image:" required. Thanks.  
16:03 <ClemensR> pegdown parser code has something like:  https://github.com/sirthias/pegdown/blob/master/src/main/java/org/pegdown/Parser.java#L1107   which looks good ... ah, and yes: no image: prefix yes, the '!' should do it  
16:04 <ClemensR> ok, cool :)  
16:05 <mrvis> that was for an image attached to page. super slick. xwiki++  
16:05 <vmassol> mrvis: it's mentioned there actually  
16:05 <vmassol> http://rendering.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Markdown11 points to https://github.com/sirthias/pegdown which points to http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/  
16:05 <vmassol> :)  
16:05 <vmassol> (we're not copying the doc from markdown basically)  
16:06 <vmassol> cool that you got it to work!  
16:31 <vmassol> didn't realize today was an upgrade day :)  
16:31 <vmassol> thanks thomas!  
16:34 <vmassol> fixing rendering build  
16:36 <tmortagne> yea received 3 mails from artifact-listener.org since yesterday :)  
16:57 <vmassol> hmmm  
16:58 <vmassol> I wonder if my fix is ok for the macro failure message  
16:58 <vmassol> now we can have stuff like:  
16:58 <vmassol> Failed to execute the [jira] macro.Cause: [Can't find descriptor for the component [role = [interface org.xwiki.rendering.macro.jira.JIRADisplayer] hint = [unknown]]]. Click on this message for details.  
16:58 <vmassol> that makes the message a bit more technical than before  
16:58 <vmassol> wdyt?  
16:59 <vmassol> not much we can do though, except have translation keys and if not translated then use this geneic message  
16:59 <vmassol> leaving it like this for now, let me know if you find it a problem
